name: AVIATION TECHNIKS & TRAINING INTERNATIONAL
about: Aviation Techniks & Training International is a premier flying school dedicated to providing comprehensive and advanced aviation training. With a rich history of over 40 years in aviation education, we offer certified programs under EASA, CASA, ICAO, IATA, and CAAC standards. Our curriculum includes ATPLs, CPLs, Bachelor's Degrees, and specialized courses for airline pilots, military pilots, cabin crew, ground handlers, and aircraft maintenance technicians. Our state-of-the-art facilities and experienced instructors ensure students receive both theoretical and practical training, preparing them for the demands of the global aviation industry. We are committed to delivering top-tier training that equips pilots and aviation professionals for success in a rapidly evolving field. At Aviation Techniks & Training International, we strive to make every training experience positive, rewarding, and tailored to individual needs.
services: ["ATA 104 AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE TYPE TRAININGS\nAVIATION ANCILLARY COURSE\nAIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE APPRENTICESHIP"]
